extension.description: The Norwegian open TV channel Frikanalen gives you the opportunity to watch live TV as well as recordings of many shows.
Den norske åpne TV-kanalen Frikanalen gir deg muligheten til å se direkte TV i tillegg til opptak av mange sendinger.

extension.news:
v0.0.3 (2018-11-06) - Added HD stream option. - Added category listing of published videos. - Show video duration in schedule and category lists. - Updated to not crash with new API date format. - Added free text video search option.
v0.0.2 (2018-11-03) - Improve package description and language settings. - Add link to channel web site. - Add link to HD stream. - Restructure menu, provide live and schedule sections.
v0.0.1 (2016-09-12) - First version of the Frikanalen Nett-TV plugin.
